title: bitcoinbass
author: bitcoinbass
content: Hello everyone,Interested on purchasing  Casascius coins loaded or Unloaded. (Preferably looking for good condition coins)Specifically interested on the following: Original series 0.1 BTC coinOriginal series 0.5 BTC coinOriginal series 1 BTC coin.Second series 1 BTC coin.1 BTC Fine Silver Round.10 BTC silver round.25 BTC Gold-Plated Round.100 BTC gold plated bar. For Transparency Sellers: Please attach your casascius pictures + https://chain.so/address/.Thanks

comments.author: bitcoinbass
comments.body: Bump, Still looking for offers. Thanks Please don't forget when you do DM me include your price, whether is loaded/unloaded + Screenshots of the coins offered for sale.Thanks

comments.author: bitcoinbass
comments.body: Quote from: Spokanistan51 on January 21, 2023, 05:14:36 PMPM sentReplied. Any other offers are always welcome. Thanks

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: I have quite a few of the coins you are searching for.  Take a look at my collection and let me know if there's one you'd like to make an offer for.  The only one shown on the thread that has been sold so far is the 0.5 BTC brass coin.  I've been holding these for a while though, so I'm not exactly in any hurry to sell any, but wanted to let it be known that for the right price (an offer that I can't refuse) I would be willing to relocate the coins to a new home.  Enjoy the pics.  Good luck finding what you're looking for.  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1944803.0

comments.author: bitcoinbass
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on January 21, 2023, 09:08:42 PMI have quite a few of the coins you are searching for.  Take a look at my collection and let me know if there's one you'd like to make an offer for.  The only one shown on the thread that has been sold so far is the 0.5 BTC brass coin.  I've been holding these for a while though, so I'm not exactly in any hurry to sell any, but wanted to let it be known that for the right price (an offer that I can't refuse) I would be willing to relocate the coins to a new home.  Enjoy the pics.  Good luck finding what you're looking for.  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1944803.0What will be the price for the 1000BTC ? Thanks

comments.author: blucepheus
comments.body: If legit, good luck in your search. Sellers, please use a reputable escrow when dealing with folks that lack significant trust.

comments.author: bitcoinbass
comments.body: Quote from: blucepheus on January 23, 2023, 02:49:16 AMIf legit, good luck in your search. Sellers, please use a reputable escrow when dealing with folks that lack significant trust.Escrow is a must! Minerjones will be handling from now on all future transactions so we are all in a good hand!
